narrative=Ben Greenwood was last seen by his sister leaving their home on Dunbar Road, East Linton. Known for seeking solitude and his recent estrangement from relatives, Ben often wandered off to occupy himself with his obsession with an online game group. On this occasion, his disappearance raised concerns due to his young age and prolonged absence. His friend mentioned he frequently talked about visiting 33 Craighouse Terrace, Edinburgh, a place linked to his online interests. After several days of searching, police located Ben at 101 Ingliston Road, Edinburgh, safe but disoriented, where he was engrossed with his online group.

narrative=Ben Greenwood was reported missing after last being seen by his friend, Rita Stokes, at a playground near his home on Dunbar Road, East Linton. Known for seeking solitude and frequently visiting remote areas, Ben was thought to have become upset before wandering off. His family, including his sister, Natasha Rose, became concerned when he didn’t return home. Investigations revealed that Ben might have been attempting to go towards 5 New Street, Edinburgh, possibly due to his strong interest in an organized protest happening nearby. He was later found at an airport, having been spotted by a member of the public who alerted authorities, who confirmed his safety and well-being.
